body_html: It's not a command line option, you'll have to edit the workspace.bzl file to replace how bazel finds its dependencies from their current sources (often, http_archive) to local_repository.
body_text: It's not a command line option, you'll have to edit the workspace.bzl file to replace how bazel finds its dependencies from their current sources (often, http_archive) to local_repository.
body: It's not a command line option, you'll have to edit the workspace.bzl file to replace how bazel finds its dependencies from their current sources (often, http_archive) to [local_repository](https://www.bazel.io/versions/master/docs/be/workspace.html#local_repository).
